Reviews.Title: Product had a little life left in it, but not much
Reviews.Author: JED
Reviews.Content: Blackberry 7290 phones seem to have a built in expiration programmed into them.  I use them for PDAs and like them for the larger keyboard. When a BB 7290 died on me, I would just get another used online.  Since I keep them backed up on a regular basis, it's easy just to get another.  Unfortunately this one only lasted a few months before it died.  So now I'm using BB Curves for PDAs instead.  The keyboard is smaller, but the stamina is much better.  I speculate that the 7290s have a little program written into the firmware that simply shuts down the device permanently after so many hours/days?
